column1: Visitation: Family at 3 P.M. Central time Friday and public from 4 P.M. until 8 P.M. Friday and after 7 A.M. Saturday until time of service at the Cowherd and Parrott Funeral Home.   Funeral Service: Funeral service at 1 P.M. Central time Saturday at the Cowherd and Parrott Funeral Home.   Interment: Macedonia Cemetery
